languages.text: Разоренная пустотная станция в системе Пояс Лангренна, по многочисленным свидетельствам, служит базой для своры пиратов, не гнушающихся сделками с ксеносами.

traits.locale_text: Разоренная пустотная станция в системе Пояс Лангренна, по многочисленным свидетельствам, служит базой для своры пиратов, не гнушающихся сделками с ксеносами.

languages.text: A plundered void station in Langrenn's Belt, according to numerous testimonies, is serving as a base for a band of pirates who aren't above doing deals with xenos.
languages.original_text: Разоренная пустотная станция в системе Пояс Лангренна, по многочисленным свидетельствам, служит базой для своры пиратов, не гнушающихся сделками с ксеносами.

traits.locale_text: A dilapidated void state in Langrenn's Belt, according to numerous testimonies, is serving as a base for a band of pirates who aren't above doing deals with xenos.
A dilapidated void state in Langrenn's Belt, according to numerous testimonies, is serving as a base for a band of pirates who aren't above doing deals with xenos.
A dilapidated void state in Langrenn's Belt, according to numerous testimonies, is serving as a base for a band of pirates who aren't above doing deals with xenos.
A marauded void station in Langrenn's Belt, according to numerous testimonies, is serving as a base for a band of pirates who aren't above doing deals with xenos.

languages.text: 许多证词表明，朗恩之带有一座虚空舰站遭到了海盗的劫掠。那群海盗把星站当做了基地，与异形做起了交易。
languages.original_text: A plundered void station in Langrenn's Belt, according to numerous testimonies, is serving as a base for a band of pirates who aren't above doing deals with xenos.

traits.locale_text: 许多证词表明，朗恩之带有一座虚空舰站遭到了海盗的劫掠。那群海盗把星站当做了基地，与异形做起了交易。
许多证词表明，朗恩之带有一座虚空舰站遭到了海盗的劫持。那群海盗把星站当做了基地，与异形做起了交易。

languages.text: 多数の証言によると、略奪されたラングレンズベルトのヴォイドステーションは、異種族との取引を厭わない海賊団のステーションとして機能している。
languages.original_text: A plundered void station in Langrenn's Belt, according to numerous testimonies, is serving as a base for a band of pirates who aren't above doing deals with xenos.

traits.locale_text: 多数の証言によると、略奪されたラングレンズベルトのヴォイドステーションは、異種族との取引を厭わない海賊団のステーションとして機能している。

languages.text: Una estación de vacío saqueada en el Cinturón de Langrenn se ha convertido en la base de una banda de piratas dispuestos a tratar con xenos, según dicen los rumores.
languages.original_text: A plundered void station in Langrenn's Belt, according to numerous testimonies, is serving as a base for a band of pirates who aren't above doing deals with xenos.

traits.locale_text: Una estación de vacío saqueada en el Cinturón de Langrenn se ha convertido en la base de una banda de piratas dispuestos a tratar con xenos, según dicen los rumores.

languages.text: Eine geplünderte Leerenstation in Langrenns Gürtel dient verschiedenen Zeugenaussagen zufolge einer Piratenbande als Basis, die kein Problem damit hat, Geschäfte mit Xenos zu machen.
languages.original_text: A plundered void station in Langrenn's Belt, according to numerous testimonies, is serving as a base for a band of pirates who aren't above doing deals with xenos.

traits.locale_text: Eine geplünderte Leerenstation in Langrenns Gürtel dient verschiedenen Zeugenaussagen zufolge einer Piratenbande als Basis, die kein Problem damit hat, Geschäfte mit Xenos zu machen.
Eine geplünderte Leerenstation in Langrenns Gürtel dient verschiedenen Zeugenaussagen zufolge einer Piratenbande als Basis, die kein Problem damit hat, Geschäfte mit Xenos zu machen.

languages.text: Une station spatiale pillée de la Ceinture de Langrenn, qui, d'après de nombreux témoignages, servirait de base à une bande de pirates s'abaissant à traiter avec les xénos.
languages.original_text: A plundered void station in Langrenn's Belt, according to numerous testimonies, is serving as a base for a band of pirates who aren't above doing deals with xenos.

traits.locale_text: Une station spatiale pillée de la Ceinture de Langrenn, qui, d'après de nombreux témoignages, servirait de base à une bande de pirates s'abaissant à traiter avec les xénos.

languages.text: Zenolarla iş yapmaktan geri durmayan bir grup korsan, gelen çok sayıda görgü tanığı ifadesine göre Langrenn Kuşağı'ndaki yağmalanmış bir uçsuz istasyonunu üs bellemiş.
languages.original_text: A plundered void station in Langrenn's Belt, according to numerous testimonies, is serving as a base for a band of pirates who aren't above doing deals with xenos.

traits.locale_text: Çok sayıda kaynaktan gelen söylentilere göre zenolarla iş birliği yapacak kadar alçalmış bir grup korsan, Langrenn Kuşağı'ndaki yağmalanmış bir uçsuz istasyonunu üssü olarak kullanıyor.
